synopsis.text: After moving to Tokyo to attend high school and escape her sheltered life, Kaho Nikaido finds herself smitten with a mysterious stranger who saves her from an oncoming truck. Determined to find her hero, she discovers that he is none other than Kanade Takahashi, the son of her landlord. Despite his initial cold demeanor, Kaho confesses her feelings, and to her surprise, Kanade agrees to date her. However, Kaho's newfound happiness takes a turn when she learns that her charming boyfriend is actually a fifth grader! As she grapples with the unexpected revelation, Kaho must decide if love knows no age limit in this heartwarming and comedic tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
